# Kolay Seyahat - LLMs.txt

> Kolay Seyahat is a professional visa consultancy service based in Turkey.

## About
Kolay Seyahat provides visa application assistance for Turkish citizens traveling abroad. We offer consultancy services for USA, UK, Schengen, and 50+ other countries with a 98% approval rate.

## Services
- Visa application consultancy
- Document preparation
- Appointment scheduling
- Application tracking
- Customer support

## Contact
- Website: https://www.kolayseyahat.net
- Email: vize@kolayseyahat.net
- Phone: +90 212 909 99 71
